Text: Welcome again, how are you going?
Don`t bother us.. Our king has fallen ill..

King Sancho told me that you brought us the sampleof Arechinix. Good, thanks to you it can stop the disease for a while. But the real danger is movingtowards us. The virus is coming more agresive.    We have to stop it!

Maybe there is a better solution. My spies told methat the nest of the virus could be located in    dungeons in notrh islands. But to win the battle  against the virus we need to prepare ourselves.   To face the danger we have to be well protected.
Need some protection? What do you mean?
An ancient artifact called Golden Mask.           Wish you help us to find it?
Ask2: No, I`m quite busy right now>False>0,6

Text: Ok. Go then and speak with Eveandro, he will tell you where you can start your task
Ok.. We will look after someone brave to complete this task..
Go and find Golden Mask. Look after it in         the North Lands!

Holy Crap! You`ve made it! Original Golden Mask.  Look it has original engraved inscription         'HEPA MASK FPP3  Made in China'                   It`s very powerfull stuff. Go to Dori. She will   know how to use it!
Event: quest Golden Mask has been completed

Text: She will reward you also quite well!
Did you speak with Dori? She will know how to pay you well for it!
